channel.title: Technology on Everyday Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Everyday Theory

item.title: The Mighty Whitespace
item.description: Look up the criticisms of Uncle Bob’s Clean Code and writing functions and you’ll be sure to find “no more than 4 lines” or something to that effect referring to the length of a function. I want to derive another way to reason about the length of a function. Let’s begin. Thoughts I want the number and complexity of thoughts to be the primary measure people think about a function. Let’s work through it with some code.
